_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

eventMergeId.title: ExperienceEvent merge ID
eventMergeId.description: An ID to correlate or merge multiple Experience events together that are essentially the same event or should be merged. This is intended to be populated by the data producer prior to ingestion.

producedBy.title: Produced By
producedBy.description: Value that describes the producer of the event - suggested values would be 'self', 'system', 'salesRep', etc. Can be used to filter out certain producers if needed.

autoPayEnrollmentStatus.title: Autopay Status
autoPayEnrollmentStatus.description: Tracks the visitor's autopay enrollment status.

web.title: Web
web.description: Link clicks, web page details, referrer information, and browser details.

personalFinances.description: Financial details including transactions, accounts, and applications.

loan.title: Loan
loan.description: Extension of form application data type.

xdm:annualPercentageRate.title: Annual Percentage Rate
xdm:annualPercentageRate.description: Records the annual percentage rate of the loan.

xdm:downpayment.title: Downpayment
xdm:downpayment.description: Captures the downpayment amount of loan.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Records the anticipated start date of the loan.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date
xdm:endDate.description: Records the anticipated end date of the loan.

xdm:interestRate.title: Interest Rate
xdm:interestRate.description: Records the interest rate of the loan.

xdm:interestType.title: Interest Type
xdm:interestType.description: Records the type interest rate of the loan, i.e. fixed or variable.

xdm:term.title: Term
xdm:term.description: Records the duration of the loan, in months.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Information related to advertising impressions, clickthroughs, and attribution.

productListItems.title: Product list items
productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record.

commerce.title: Commerce
commerce.description: Product returns, warranty registration, and shopping cart/order process.

directMarketing.title: Direct marketing
directMarketing.description: Events and properties related to direct and outbound marketing such as email, direct mail, texts, and in-app notifications.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Information about the surrounding situation the event observation occurred in, specifically detailing transitory information such as the network or software versions.

device.title: Device
device.description: An identified device, application or device browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

placeContext.title: Place context
placeContext.description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, and working hours.

fileTransfer.description: Information for file download or file upload activities.

fileDownload.title: File Download
fileDownload.description: Tracks all details of a file download. Extension of file transfer data type.

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Tracks all details of a file upload. Extension of file transfer data type.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation details
implementationDetails.description: Accomodates tracking versioning details for the Adobe Experience Cloud solutions deployed.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Tracks offer impression and social network interactions.

media.title: Media
media.description: Media activity information related to the experience event.

offers.description: Offer tracking, including offer impressions and clickthroughs.

clicks.title: Offer Clicks
clicks.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been clicked.

dismissals.title: Offer Dismissals
dismissals.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been dismissed.

impressions.title: Offer Impression Details
impressions.description: An array of advertisements that have been displayed to a customer.

quotes.description: Quotes information including discount, premium, and request ID.

requestID.title: Quote Request ID
requestID.description: Unique identifier for the quote request.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Records the discount amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: Records the premium amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

location.title: Location
location.description: Captures the postal code used for finding retailers near the visitor's location.

selectedRetailer.title: Selected Retailer
selectedRetailer.description: Captures the selected retailer for a quote request, if applicable.

socialMarketing.description: Tracks interactions related to social marketing sites, such as shares and follows.

sharedContent.title: Shared Content
sharedContent.description: Tracks the page/url/content/value of the item being shared.

follow.title: Follow
follow.description: Tracks when a social follow event has occurred.

interactions.title: Interactions
interactions.description: The total number of social interactions.

network.title: Network
network.description: Tracks the social sharing network in use, i.e. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

target.title: Target
target.description: For social interactions, this is the URL (or resource) which receives the social network action.

share.title: Share
share.description: Tracks when a social sharing event has occurred.

surveyResponse.description: Stores details related to a survey that has been completed by a user.

surveyAnswers.title: Survey Answers
surveyAnswers.description: An array of the answers provided by the visitor within a survey.

surveyID.title: Survey ID
surveyID.description: ID for the specific survey taken.

surveyQuestions.title: Survey Questions
surveyQuestions.description: An array of the questions presented to the visitor within a survey.

userAccount.description: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.

accountSwitch.title: Switch User Accounts
accountSwitch.description: Captures when a visitor switches their account during a visit.

cookieConsentAccepted.title: Cookie Consent Accepted
cookieConsentAccepted.description: Tracked when a visitor opts-in to allowing cookies to be set within their browser.

cookieConsentViewed.title: Cookie Consent Viewed
cookieConsentViewed.description: Tracked when a visitor views the cookie consent information.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot password process.

forgotUsername.title: Forgot Username
forgotUsername.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot username process.

login.title: Visitor Login
login.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor login.

loginBiometric.title: Biometric Authentication
loginBiometric.description: Flag determining if the user has used a biometric authentication process to login.

loginFailure.title: Visitor Login Failure
loginFailure.description: Counter event indicating a failed visitor login attempt.

loginLocation.title: Login Page Location
loginLocation.description: When multiple login locations exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used for login

loginKeychain.title: Keychain
loginKeychain.description: Flag determining if the user has used a keychain authentication process to login.

loginMultiFactor.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
loginMultiFactor.description: Flag determining if the user has used a multi-factor authentication process to login.

loginStatus.title: Login Status
loginStatus.description: Used to track the current login status for site visitors, regardless of whether login occurred as a result of a login during the current session or a previous session as identified by a cookie value.

loginThirdParty.title: Login with Third Party
loginThirdParty.description: Counter event that is incremented when a visitor has used another login network to authenticate, such as Apple, Facebook, or Google.

loginThirdPartySite.title: Third Party Login Site
loginThirdPartySite.description: Tracks the site used to authetnicate when a third-party sign-in event is tracked.

logout.title: Visitor Logout
logout.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor logout.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the reset password process.

sessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Tracked when a visitor has an authenticated session that is automatically logged out after a predetermined amount of time.

updateProfile.title: Account Profile Update
updateProfile.description: Counter event indicating a user has updated their account profile.

customerFeedback.description: Customer interaction information such as chat, click to call, email and survey questions/answers.

chatDeclined.title: Chat Declined
chatDeclined.description: Captured when an offered chat is declined by a visitor.

chatEnd.title: Chat End
chatEnd.description: Captured when a chat is ended with a visitor.

chatOffered.title: Chat Offered
chatOffered.description: Captures the number of times a chat session has been offered to a visitor.

chatSessionID.title: Chat Session ID
chatSessionID.description: Captures the chat session identifier, if available.

chatStart.title: Chat Start
chatStart.description: Captured when a chat is initiated with a visitor.

clickToCall.title: Click to Call
clickToCall.description: Visitor initiates a call to the client from a telephone number link on the site/app.

clickToDirectMessage.title: Click to Direct Message
clickToDirectMessage.description: Visitor initiates a direct message or feedback to the client from a direct message form on the site/app.

clickToEmail.title: Click to Email
clickToEmail.description: Visitor initiates an email to the client from an email link on the site/app.

clickToText.title: Click to Text
clickToText.description: Visitor initiates a SMS/text message to the client from a SMS/text link on the site/app.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Subject of contact requested by the visitor, such as in-store purchase support, online order support, credit customer service, etc.

callBackNumber.title: Call Back Contact Information
callBackNumber.description: The contact phone number the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

replyToEmailAddress.title: Reply to Email Address
replyToEmailAddress.description: The email address the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

upgrades.description: Upgrade information including impressions and transactions associated with upgrades.

upgradeImpressions.title: Upgrade Impressions
upgradeImpressions.description: Array of the impressions data type.

upsells.description: Upsell information including impressions and transactions associated with upsells.

upsellImpressions.title: Upsell Impressions
upsellImpressions.description: Array of the impressions data type.

warrantyClaim.description: Captures fields related to a claim when initated by a customer.

length.title: Length
length.description: Records the length of the warranty, in months.
